field.name: glance behavior
field.help: how does the speaker of this vocalization direct his gaze?

field.name: glance recipient behavior
field.help: how does someone who hears me behave?

field.name: sound repetition delay
field.help: Minimum delay time between playing the same permutation

field.name: allowable queue delay
field.help: How long to wait to actually start the vocalization

field.help: How long to wait to actually start the vocalization

field.name: notification delay
field.help: How long into the vocalization the AI should be notified

field.name: post voc. delay
field.help: How long speech is suppressed in the speaking unit after vocalizing

field.name: repeat delay
field.help: How long before the same vocalization can be repeated

field.name: weight
field.help: Inherent weight of this vocalization

field.name: notification delay
field.help: How long into the vocalization the AI should be notified

field.name: post voc. delay
field.help: How long speech is suppressed in the speaking unit after vocalizing

field.name: repeat delay
field.help: How long before the same vocalization can be repeated

field.name: weight
field.help: Inherent weight of this vocalization

field.name: speaker freeze time
field.help: speaker won't move for the given amount of time

field.name: listener freeze time
field.help: listener won't move for the given amount of time (from start of vocalization)

field.name: glance behavior
field.help: how does the speaker of this vocalization direct his gaze?

field.name: glance recipient behavior
field.help: how does someone who hears me behave?

field.name: sound repetition delay
field.help: Minimum delay time between playing the same permutation

field.name: allowable queue delay
field.help: How long to wait to actually start the vocalization

field.name: pre voc. delay
field.help: How long to wait to actually start the vocalization

field.name: notification delay
field.help: How long into the vocalization the AI should be notified

field.name: post voc. delay
field.help: How long speech is suppressed in the speaking unit after vocalizing

field.name: repeat delay
field.help: How long before the same vocalization can be repeated

field.name: weight
field.help: Inherent weight of this vocalization

field.name: speaker freeze time
field.help: speaker won't move for the given amount of time

field.name: listener freeze time
field.help: listener won't move for the given amount of time (from start of vocalization)

field.help: how does the speaker of this vocalization direct his gaze?

field.help: How long speech is suppressed in the speaking unit after vocalizing

field.help: How long before the same vocalization can be repeated

field.help: speaker won't move for the given amount of time

field.help: listener won't move for the given amount of time (from start of vocalization)

field.help: how does the speaker of this vocalization direct his gaze?

field.name: glance recipient behavior
field.help: how does someone who hears me behave?
